sections.heading: S2. Ep7. Talking with Nathan Theos about good relationships and engagement between developers, general contractors, and subcontractors for project success

sections.content: In this week's podcast, we talk with +[Nathan Theos](https://www.linkedin.com/in/construction-advisory-australia/)+, a well-known construction professional who has worked for large Tier one organisations like +[Probuild](https://probuildaustralia.com.au/)+, +[Multiplex](https://www.multiplex.global/au/)+, and +[Built](https://www.built.com.au/)+. He's also the Managing Director at +[Construction Collaborative](https://www.constructioncollaborative.com.au/)+, his own company.

We spoke about his view on the D&C contract, ECI and competitively tendered projects, combative relationships in Construction and how to resolve them, managing challenging projects (including Wembley Stadium in the UK), and other topics relating to the relationship and the engagement between developers, head contractors, and subcontractors.
Amongst other things, in this podcast we discussed:

items: The impact of Covid in the construction industry
Major projects that he's been part of over the years
Managing the risks in projects and how to de-risk them

sections.content: If you have an interest in the Melbourne building industry, building and developing a company within the industry, or have an interest in what takes place within a business of this size, then have a listen.
